system.description:
You learn to work as a team and protect those around you. You are proficient with the Sanguine Knot combat tradition (you may select a different tradition if you are already proficient with Sanguine Knot) and learn a single first-degree maneuver from it, which does not count against your maneuvers known.

Furthermore, you learn to put yourself in the path of incoming attacks. When a creature within 5 feet of you is targeted with an attack, you may use your reaction to make that attack target you instead.
